testcase.name: Create new user with invalid user details (outline example : | | vitalii@nomail.com | secret | Name can't be blank |)
Create new user with invalid user details (outline example : | Vitalii Kachalo | | secret | Email can't be blank, Email is invalid |)
Create new user with invalid user details (outline example : | Vitalii Kachalo | vitalii@nomail.com | | Password can't be blank |)
Create new user with invalid user details (outline example : | Vitalii Kachalo | vitalii@hotmail.com | secret | Email has already been taken |)
Create new user with invalid user details (outline example : | Vitalii Kachalo | vitalii@nomail.com | sec | Password is too short (minimum is 6 characters) |)
Create new user with invalid user details (outline example : | Vitalii Kachalo | plainaddress | secret | Email is invalid | Missing @ sign and domain |)
Create new user with invalid user details (outline example : | Vitalii Kachalo | #@%^%#$@#$@#.com | secret | Email is invalid | Garbage |)
Create new user with invalid user details (outline example : | Vitalii Kachalo | @domain.com | secret | Email is invalid | Missing username |)
Create new user with invalid user details (outline example : | Vitalii Kachalo | Joe Smith <email@domain.com> | secret | Email is invalid | Encoded html within email is invalid |)
Create new user with invalid user details (outline example : | Vitalii Kachalo | email.domain.com | secret | Email is invalid | Missing @ |)
Create new user with invalid user details (outline example : | Vitalii Kachalo | email@domain@domain.com | secret | Email is invalid | Two @ sign |)
Create new user with invalid user details (outline example : | Vitalii Kachalo | email@domain.com (Joe Smith) | secret | Email is invalid | Text followed email is not allowed |)
Create new user with invalid user details (outline example : | Vitalii Kachalo | email@domain | secret | Email is invalid | Missing top level domain (.com/.net/.org/etc) |)
Create new user with invalid user details (outline example : | Vitalii Kachalo | email@111.222.333.44444 | secret | Email is invalid | Invalid IP format |)
Create new user with invalid user details (outline example : | Vitalii Kachalo | email@domain..com | secret | Email is invalid | Multiple dot in the domain portion is invalid |)
Login with invalid user details
Logout user
Get user details without valid authentication (user is not logged in)
Delete user without valid authentication (user is not logged in)
Get user without valid authorization (user is logged in, but trying to access another account)
Delete user without valid authorization (user is logged in, but trying to delete another account)
